name: xp-router
description: This class is used to do client/server side routing.
author: ExpandJS <dev@expandjs.com> (http://expandjs.com)

scripts.build: browserify index -i director -i expandjs | derequire > dist/xp-router.js && npm run build:min
scripts.build:min: browserify -d index -i director -i expandjs -p [minifyify --map xp-router.min.map --output dist/xp-router.min.map] | derequire > dist/xp-router.min.js
